title: Create Report Showing Frequently Bought With from Orders List
snippet:
Looking for a data analyst to review two reports (one shopify orders, one amazon orders)
and complete a report detailing the two most frequently bought with products from each marketplace.

The report should treat amazon and shopify as separate marketplaces.
The report should list each product, and the top two bought with products (name, SKU and number of times bought with)

I have attached the data from shopify and amazon, as well as the report template with example records.

The data must be in the format of the 'FrequentlyBoughtWith.xlsx" report attached to this posting.

Please provide a quote for billable hours as well as an ETA when you expect you can have this complete.

title: Converting CSV Output to Fixed Format PDF
snippet: I am looking for someone to take the output in a CSV file from an online Project management tool and create a fixed format PDF file.  I envision a utility that prompts the user to load the file, prompts for company name and prompts for report name.  It would then produce a hard copy report.  I will be attaching a CSV file,  an excel spreadsheet of format and a partial example of PDF output.  Whether you use some open source report writing tools or just simply create in PDF format is up to programmer as I am not a programmer. In the CSV file I will not need Task ID, Created At, Last Modified Tags, Notes.  You will have to be able to identify subtasks which are distinguished by the fact they have a Parent Task.  In addition, if their is more than one project in the Projects column, both will have to be reported. If Excel is used, it must have a version for PC and MAC, otherwise a utility will have to be used that just accomodates the CSV import and creates the report. Good luck in the review

title: List of largest premium digital video publishers
snippet:
We need a list of the largest websites that host premium video content. For example, HBOGO.com, Netflix, WSJ.com, NYTimes.com, CC.com, NFL.com, NBA.com, FoodNetwork.com.

We would like as many premium publishers as you can find, more than the obvious ones mentioned above. We would like to find smaller, more niche, premium video content providers as well. 

Premium video means that there is a membership or paid option to access the content (either through a direct subscription or through a partner service like a cable subscription for login).

Ideally, we want more than 1,000 companies on this list.

The pay rate is $2 for every 100 companies you can find, up to $100.

On the final spreadsheet, we just need the company name, website, and headquarter location (city, state, country), and link to the business LinkedIn profile page (if available).

title: Query Writer
snippet:
Our website offers SQL training and practice for our students. We need someone to come up with more SQL challenges for our students. We need you to write us 25 challenges for this project.

For an example, please see this page: https://www.sqlprep.com/sql-prep-daily-sql-challenge-41/

For this project, we need 10 basic queries and 15 more advanced queries. Basic queries generally utilize a single table, have conditions in the WHERE clause, use functions in the SELECT clause, etc. Advanced queries utilize subqueries, joins, etc.

Upon winning the bid, I will describe how to use our system to test queries and submit the queries to the site.

title: Research for presentations on data science in media and entertainment
snippet:
I’m preparing a series of presentations on the use of data science in media and entertainment. I have eight different presentations that I need help with, and they can be done by different people. All of these topics are done in the context of media and entertainment:

1. Audience analytics
2. Pricing algorithms
3. Optimizing resource allocation
4. Evaluation and accountability
5. Managing digital and live interactions
6. Performing arts programming
7. Using data science to protect intellectual property
7. Optimizing non-financial incentives

What I need is an outline of content to answer ten general questions on each topic. Each of ten questions needs answers that can be summarized in about three bullet points (or a graphic or animation that I would create that would convey similar information). Provide a URL for your answers and text to serve as speaker notes.

The information needs to be concise and it needs to be accurate. I don’t need direct quotes, especially as those can cause copyright problems. Instead, paraphrase the idea and give the reference.

Also, please don’t pull all of your information from one source, because that lapses into plagiarism. It’s okay if all statements on a single slide come from one source, but try to use at least six different sources across the ten questions. (More than twelve is fine but not absolutely necessary.)

I am planning on presenting this information in live workshops and recording it for online videos. Consequently, it is critical that there be no copyright limitations on the information that is provided (hence the request to paraphrase). And, to point out the obvious, I will hold the copyright for this finished presentation based on this research.

I have attached static PDF as an example of the documents I need help with. I'll give the selected people access to the live documents in Google Docs. (Please note: I am NOT asking to create the presentation. I am asking you to do the research and put the information in Google Docs. That way I can then transfer the information to the Keynote template that I will use.)

title: **Assistance needed** Pull school data from online websites(name, email, district, etc..)
snippet:
Hi, I am looking for a va(super fast and 100% accurate) to research and find information on Elementary Schools(usually grades k-5 or k-6).   Then upload the required data into an excel sheet.   You will need to find the following for each school in the zip code given, if there are schools that come up resulting the search we will want those also. 
We are a Spanish school in the united states who provides after school Spanish classes to elementary schools that don’t already have it.  We need the data from elementary schools in the zip codes(areas) chosen so that we can reach out to them and offer our services.   We will want every elementary school and the data for the zip codes provided. 
For an example and to see if you would be interested in this ongoing project, I have provided an example of what we want below, You will search the zip code given on google followed by Elementary School, like this example; 63025 Elementary Schools(google Search) then click go, 

   
It came with 4 schools, you will then need to go to the website of each school to find the data needed, School District Name, School Name, School address, Principle Name, Principle Email, Phone Number. Upload to the blank excel provided. 

I have complete instruction on finding the schools and blank excel sheet that will need filled out.  We will be paying milestones and $.12 for every school with required data found.   This will be an ongoing project.   I need someone who is willing to work on this a lot of time and complete the task to finish in a very timely manner. There will be more zip codes daily,  Thank you

Essentially, I need an overview of all practices combined, a summary of each practice, an overview of 1 specific practice with ability to toggle between practices, details of each practice, details of procedure metrics, and relevant dates for the data of each practices. All of this is in the attached. 

Let me know what questions you have and please provide work examples of Power BI to prove you are the best fit for the job.

title: Simple LinkedIn Data matching (Partially completed)
snippet:
I have a list of company names, URLs & locations - I need you to:
A) Go through the URLs and find the matching company on LinkedIn (the country location might be useful if there are multiple companies with the same name). 
B) Write down the industry (LinkedIn has standard industry fields). THIS HAS BEEN COMPLETED. 
C) Write down the number of employees (eg 11-50, 1-10, 51-200, etc). 
D) Write down the year founded. 
E) Write down the LinkedIn URL. THIS HAS BEEN PARTIALLY COMPLETED. 

E) I then need you to match the industries listed in A into a specific list that we use internally in our company. 
EG the industry type 'Internet' in LinkedIn would be 'Software Company & IT' in our internal category.

To prepare for your presentation you should define “big data”, as well as the costs and benefits of data collection for your type of organization. Make an argument for tactics your organization can use to reap the benefits of online participation and counter what you consider to be the more serious costs to your organization. Be sure to identify what type of organization you are working for (Twitter) and cite from the readings as appropriate.

Guidelines in attachment,  Due Sunday March 19, 2017 at 11:59 PM
